website_summaries.verdict: A solid choice for families that prefer a basic, natural design that won't look unappealing.
pros: Unique, natural-looking design appeals to adults and children alike, and fits most yard styles

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: 3 year old loves it!! ... easy assembly, took about 1hr with two ppl... holds 400 lbs of sand. I use 8 50lbs bags and it is filled to the brim... could definitely use less.. wood is soft so I worry about durability... also the bottom pieces fit together loosely so its not solid but with sand in it its not going anywhere... thought it was going to be bigger, two kids will definitely be tight..
customer_reviews.author: krystal Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sand box!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! My daughter has been in it non stop. It took about an hour to build so wasn’t to bad. I couldn’t find anywhere that says how much play sand so I wanted to let everyone know who is thinking about buying this. I bought 5- 50 lbs from Home Depot and 4 were plenty. So you will need 200 lbs of sand.
customer_reviews.author: Camilla

customer_reviews.title: Not what you'd expect for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty cheaply made. It's flimsy and the top is very difficult to slide up or down but my child loves it. The sides shake a bit but I'm hoping we can patch it some sort of way to make it sturdier. Definitely way overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great Sandbox!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sandbox at a great price. There were several different types to choose from and I feel This was the best choice for the money. It was easy to put together. I live the fact the canopy lowers down for a cover. My granddaughter is obviously thrilled with it too.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel John

customer_reviews.title: The closing lid and bench seats.  Great!
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves it. The cover protects him from the sun and closes at rest to keep unwanted animals from digging in it as well as keeping the sand dry. I also love the little bench seats you can sit on while playing with my grandson.
customer_reviews.author: Kim G

customer_reviews.title: Came damaged and very less durable material
customer_reviews.text: Very very delicate material. Felt like cardboard moving box material. The product came damaged and they have fixed the already damaged wood with some kind of cheap wax.see the pictures. I don't recommend!
customer_reviews.author: PHK

customer_reviews.title: Great little sandbox for the price
customer_reviews.text: Honestly this was a way better deal than I expected. Easy to put together and so far it seems fairly sturdy. I bought 400 lbs of sand (8 fifty pound bags) but I only had to use 5 of them which filled the box about 3/4 of the way. My daughter loves it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely clever design: The canopy slides down to form a cover when not in use. It is cat-proof as tested by our family pets! Appearance is pleasing. This is a GREAT sandbox. Assembly is best done with two adults. There are LOTS of parts, but everything is very clearly labeled and the instructions (all as diagrams) are clear and easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla C.

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter loves her sand box
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter. She likes digging in the backyard. So this sand box is perfect for her. She loves playing in it. I like that the top goes all the way down. Keeps it dry when we get the rain.
customer_reviews.author: Russell glover

customer_reviews.title: Love the sandbox
customer_reviews.text: My grandson got this for his 3rd birthday and he loves it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together defiantly don't need all the sand it say, everyone's recommendations for a smaller amount were correct. Unfortunately when you lower the top it is flimsy doesn't hold out even the smallest amount of rain.
customer_reviews.author: margie pfeil

customer_reviews.title: Good investment
customer_reviews.text: My son and daughter in law said that it was a bit of a pain to assemble, but my 2 year old grandson loves it! Love that it has a canopy and I even sat on it and played in it with him. Very sturdy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Niceeeee
customer_reviews.text: Nice easy to put together it took me 30 min .and its nice durable but light.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value sandbox
customer_reviews.text: The pieces were well labeled for assembly and materials are good quality. Kids love it!
customer_reviews.author: Christina U

customer_reviews.title: 3 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Two pieces were damaged but I don't have the patience to wait for the refund to buy a different one because it won't let me exchange the product for the same item. 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Martina

product_meta.title: Teamson Kids - Wooden Outdoor Sandbox w/Convertible Canopy Children Outdoor Playset for Backyard Home Lawn Garden Beach Large Sand Box w/Height Adjustable & Rotatable Canopy - Blue
product_meta.description: Sandbox stories are some of the greatest memories of our childhood. Give your little ones the same joy with the Teamson Kids Summer Sandbox with Canopy. Made from wood finished in a water-based stain, this square sandbox with protective sun canopy safely accommodates small children and toddlers ages 3 years and older.
feature_bullets: DURABLE AND STURDY – crafted from solid wood
AGES 3 & UP – suitable for children and toddlers ages 3 & older
ENVIRONMENTALLY SAFE – finished in an earth safe water-based stain
LEAD FREE – safe for developing children

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars39 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
